title: Christ Embodied through Time and Space in the Beauty of Liturgy Acted Out by Living Stones
description:
Adam Hendrix is a young adults pastor at Menlo Church in Silicon Valley. A former musician, Adam speaks about his growing interest in ancient wisdom and the beauty and meaning of narrative and liturgy.

We also discuss a recent message of Adam's about the meaning and purpose of work in our lives, and the Two Kingdoms.

Adam's music can be found on Spotify. The album he wrote and performed is called Swept Away and was written after the death of his father when Adam was only 26.

Adam's message on work can be found here:
https://menlo.church/series/you-were-made-for-this#/modal/message/9732/mlo

The first six lessons on Genesis that Karen mentioned:
https://menlo.church/genesis-reading-plan
